compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses (including EF-S lenses) * Excluding EF-M lenses (35mm-equivalent focal length is approx. 1.6 times the lens focal length)
afpoints: 9-point AF (Center point: cross-type and vertical line sensitive to f/2.8)
focusmodes: One-Shot AF (ONE SHOT) AI Servo AF (AI SERVO) AI Focus AF (AI FOCUS) Manual focusing (MF)
pixels: Effective pixels: Approx. 18.00 megapixels Total pixels: Approx. 18.50 megapixels
